select a.*, datediff(asDate, now()) as date_diff, e.name as engineerName from asRequest a left join engineerS e on a.engineerIdx=e.idx where a.idx = #{idx};
select count(*) from review where asIdx = #{idx};
mapper.insert: insert into asRequest values (default, #{vo.asMid}, #{vo.asName}, #{vo.asDate}, #{vo.asPlace}, #{vo.address}, #{vo.engineerIdx}, #{vo.machine}, #{vo.progress}, default, #{vo.detailNote}, null, null);
